title: Bob the builder can we fix it

replies.body: No one can fix that.... monstrosity and abomination of champion balance and design  that is Ryze.

Vagene the builder.
LOL, one question is now going through my head, does India have a League server, if not, where do they play?

answer is, um , UM,....
they probably dont play League....
Pozz i respect hehe (Indija4life)

Ryze i can summorize as:
Spammy
mana scaling
root cc

i think these things tend to be bad things when combined, and is the trouble that he has.
Spammy champs were gated by mana, and when you have lots of mana and scale from them (however minute(my-newt)), that is kind of irrelevant and exacerbates the problem 
Spammy and root cc creates the whole "assassin" problem of inability to fight back while taking a beating in the case of melee

> [{quoted}](name=Boulderox,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bEAixFA1,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-05-06T23:48:24.757+0000)
>
> Ryze i can summorize as:
> Spammy
> mana scaling
> root cc
> 
> i think these things tend to be bad things when combined, and is the trouble that he has.
> Spammy champs were gated by mana, and when you have lots of mana and scale from them (however minute(my-newt)), that is kind of irrelevant and exacerbates the problem 
> Spammy and root cc creates the whole "assassin" problem of inability to fight back while taking a beating in the case of melee

They are changing his CC to a slow apparently...
But making him even more spammy.
